TopicTitle: The developer of flappy bird is using a dirty marketing trick.

Articles.Content:
So, the developer of flappy bird said he is taking flappy bird off the App Store. We'll, he just did. Now he made a Reskin called "Splashy fish" immediately after flappy bird is removed. It is obvious the developer is using this trick to keep up the hype for flappy bird.

Let me know what you think!

I say it will end just as badly as the last one.

He steals SEGA's assets, uses them for a small profit, then removes it before they sue him.

Not only that, but some guy killed his brother over flappy bird. Yeah.
He's successful when people bother to give him attention and keep talking about his stuff, people seem to be getting worked up over nothing.

He's successful when people bother to give him attention and keep talking about his stuff, people seem to be getting worked up over nothing.

And he increased the attention by making a drama that he will remove flappy bird and then making a Reskin.
..good thing I don't have a phone with an app store...
I still have flappy bird, high score of 15. I feel like a god now.

I still have flappy bird, high score of 15. I feel like a god now.

You were saying?

I don't know the specifics but I'm pretty sure his brother didn't die; a quick Google search seemed to disprove that. Also, I went to Splashy Fish on the iTunes page and it says it is by Massimo Guareschi. The creator of Flappy Bird is Dong Nguyen.

I don't get the big deal, I see on sites saying thing like "The game has received criticism for being too simple and too difficult." It's a game for a phone lol.

I'm not mad at anyone here, I just think it's silly how big of a deal people make of the game

The game became popular because of Pewdiepie.It isn't that hard,It's not infuriating,and it's pretty bad(IMO).

A coptor reskin.
It wasn't even that hard to make the highscore 123456789012345, so it's a poorly constructed game
If people get so worked up over such a stupid game, why doesn't anyone so the same with KSP? I've never heard of anyone breaking their computer because their rocket didn't launch.

Because it's a stupid game. Really. Sometimes the most addicting gameplay (for the general population) is the simplest gameplay, one that provides you with a reward (highscores)

Put that in a phone with zero entry barrier and...

And he increased the attention by making a drama that he will remove flappy bird and then making a Reskin.

The entire reason he deleted it was because he was getting attention. He's a guy that slapped together a few stock assets to make for practice, and he decided to stick it on the play store to see if he could at least let get a bit of return on the time he spent. Suddenly half of the internet starts attacking him, and he gets multiple death threats, so he decides to get rid of the whole thing as best he can. There's no 'strategy' here, just a fairly typical guy getting a fairly typical '15 minutes of fame' episode. As for the reskin, there are literally hundreds of reskins of this game. If you don't believe that, just put 'flappy' into the google play store and start counting.
